name: libber

women's libber : If a woman was assertive, she was accused of being a libber. I'm a life-long libber but I don't think she's the best candidate for the job. See
lib
More examplesFewer examplesPosing as a libber, one of our reporters attended a secret meeting of a pro-abortion group.He was attacked by a libber brandishing an umbrella.
